Address.value: 1000 BALLPARK WAY,SUITE 400, ARLINGTON, Texas, 76011, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Six Flags Entertainment Corp owns and operates theme parks worldwide. The company operates around 26 theme parks and waterparks, 23 are located in the United States, two are located in Mexico and one is located in Montreal, Canada. The parks generally offer various rides, water attractions, themed areas, concerts, restaurants, game venues, and merchandise outlets.
